annotations.summary: Patient presents with exertional chest pressure for one week.
Chest sensation described as heaviness in center of chest.
Pain occasionally radiates to left arm.
Episodes last 5-10 minutes and resolve with rest.
Associated shortness of breath and sweating, no nausea.
Cholesterol around 240. Father had heart attack at age 55.
Discontinued atorvastatin six months ago due to muscle cramps.
Non-smoker, drinks a couple of beers most nights.
